prewedding_02.jpg.alt: Rituparna and Shoumo in an antique room with warm amber tones and vintage furniture
prewedding_02.jpg.caption: Amber light, timeless grace

prewedding_01.jpg.alt: Wide view of an ornate heritage haveli corridor with arched doorways and warm light
prewedding_01.jpg.caption: Where the story begins — a corridor of anticipation

prewedding_03.jpg.alt: Rituparna adjusting her hair in a mirror reflection, a candid moment of preparation
prewedding_03.jpg.caption: A quiet moment before the world rushes in

prewedding_04.jpg.alt: Portrait of Rituparna and Shoumo framed by green-shuttered windows of the haveli
prewedding_04.jpg.caption: Framed by heritage, coloured by love

prewedding_05.jpg.alt: Shoumo kneeling in the haveli corridor in a chivalrous, cinematic pose
prewedding_05.jpg.caption: A promise whispered in the corridor of time

prewedding_06.jpg.alt: Rituparna by an exterior column, tucking her hair with a gentle gesture
prewedding_06.jpg.caption: Grace in the smallest gestures

prewedding_07.jpg.alt: Wide shot of Rituparna and Shoumo playfully posing before the grand haveli facade
prewedding_07.jpg.caption: Playful hearts against grand walls

prewedding_08.jpg.alt: Wide shot of Rituparna and Shoumo kissing before the haveli facade
prewedding_08.jpg.caption: A kiss sealed in stone and sunlight

prewedding_09.jpg.alt: Black and white close-up of Rituparna and Shoumo with foreheads touching tenderly
prewedding_09.jpg.caption: Where words end, foreheads meet

prewedding_10.jpg.alt: Dramatic window silhouette of the couple in black and white
prewedding_10.jpg.caption: Light and shadow, love and longing

prewedding_11.jpg.alt: Window silhouette of the couple sharing a kiss, black and white
prewedding_11.jpg.caption: A silhouette worth a thousand words

prewedding_12.jpg.alt: Black and white close-up of the couple with ethereal backlighting
prewedding_12.jpg.caption: Ethereal — where light dissolves into love

prewedding_13.jpg.alt: Wide shot of the opulent palace darbar hall with fairy lights and red drapes
prewedding_13.jpg.caption: The palace awaits — fairy lights and crimson dreams

prewedding_14.jpg.alt: Rituparna and Shoumo dancing and twirling joyfully in the palace hall
prewedding_14.jpg.caption: Lost in the music of each other

prewedding_15.jpg.alt: Rituparna and Shoumo together on the palace steps with lotus motifs
prewedding_15.jpg.caption: On steps carved with stories of their own

prewedding_16.jpg.alt: Detail shot of clasped hands resting on the lotus-carved palace steps
prewedding_16.jpg.caption: Hands that found each other and never let go

prewedding_17.jpg.alt: Rituparna and Shoumo walking through a sunlit park, laughing together
prewedding_17.jpg.caption: Sunlit laughter, the simplest kind of magic

prewedding_18.jpg.alt: Rituparna and Shoumo sharing a nose kiss in the park surrounded by greenery
prewedding_18.jpg.caption: A stolen moment between the leaves

prewedding_19.jpg.alt: Close-up of Rituparna laughing with genuine, radiant joy
prewedding_19.jpg.caption: This laugh — the reason for everything

prewedding_20.jpg.alt: Rituparna and Shoumo embracing beneath a canopy of palm trees
prewedding_20.jpg.caption: Shelter found in each other, under a canopy of palms

prewedding_21.jpg.alt: Dramatic black and white shot under an ancient tree canopy with sprawling branches
prewedding_21.jpg.caption: Roots run deep — a love story as old as the trees

prewedding_22.jpg.alt: Black and white cinematic shot of the couple walking down a tree-lined avenue
prewedding_22.jpg.caption: Walking into forever, one frame at a time

prewedding_23.jpg.alt: Black and white shot of Rituparna and Shoumo standing under a grand banyan tree
prewedding_23.jpg.caption: Under the banyan — two souls, one shade

prewedding_24.jpg.alt: Shoumo kissing Rituparna's forehead tenderly among the trees
prewedding_24.jpg.caption: A forehead kiss worth a thousand promises

prewedding_25.jpg.alt: Rituparna and Shoumo walking hand in hand, looking at each other and laughing
prewedding_25.jpg.caption: Hand in hand, step by step — this is how forever begins

prewedding_26.jpg.alt: Black and white wide shot of the couple walking through a forest clearing
prewedding_26.jpg.caption: Into the woods, into each other — a love story in monochrome
